about_the_game:
A turn based strategy game in which you manage your resources, plan ahead, and build your city and army to defend the next day wave. You will need to decide what units to make, where to position your army, properly use counter to specific enemy units, choose which techs are best to upgrade on each scenario, and when it's better to prioritize army, technology or buildings.

Embark on a journey of strategic depth where time moves at your pace. In this turn-based, casually profound adventure, manage resources, build formidable fortifications, and assemble resilient armies to fend off relentless invaders. Evolve your technology, fortify defenses, and lead your civilization to victory in this immersive and relaxed city-building strategy challenge.



The game is currently in its early development stages. Join our Discord server for updates and to share your ideas for development collaboration
